DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : OTHER NEWS
DOC.TEXT: Exxon Appeals Damage Award : The oil_company said it filed motions in U.S. District Court in Anchorage , Alaska , to overturn or reduce the verdicts in a host of civil lawsuits deriving from the 1989 Exxon Valdez oil_tanker spill . Exxon Corp . Chairman Lee R . Raymond described as particularly " unwarranted , unfair and . . . excessive " the $ 5-billion punitive-damages award handed_down by an Anchorage jury Sept . 16 .
